visualization.name: MVP Application
visualization.help:
# What is the MVP Application?
The Galaxy-based **MVP visualization plugin** enables viewing of results produced from workflows integrating genomic sequencing data and mass spectrometry (MS)-based proteomics data, commonly known as **proteogenomics**.
This multi-functional tool provides:
- Organization and filtering of results - Quality assessment of tandem mass spectrometry (MS/MS) data matched to peptide sequences - Visualization of data at both the **protein** and **gene** level
With relatively few keystrokes, users can filter and order large datasets down to a manageable subset.
